testCases.name: test_s_pen_functionality
testCases.input: What can I do with the S Pen on the Galaxy S22 Ultra?
testCases.actualOutput: You can use the S Pen on the Galaxy S22 Ultra to launch apps, take notes, draw pictures, write in text fields (with handwriting converted to text), and edit the converted text. Additionally, it can be used for remote functions and to select third-party content.

metricsData.name: Fluency [GEval]
metricsData.reason: The response is grammatically correct, well-structured, and uses appropriate vocabulary. It accurately and clearly lists several key S Pen features on the Galaxy S22 Ultra, such as note-taking, drawing, handwriting-to-text, editing, remote functions, and third-party content selection. However, it could be slightly improved by specifying examples of remote functions (like taking photos or controlling presentations) for even greater clarity.
